entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
